testcase.name: LB-1132 : Verify "Go1Percent" logo, carousel images, carousel caption and the footer message (TC-337)

LB-1134 : Verify that carousel image changes while clicking on carousel button (TC-339)
LB-1136 : Verify that specific text between login options is present on the web page (TC-341)
LB-1135 : Verify that login page heading contains text "Sign in to Go 1%" is displayed (TC-340)
LB-1137 : Verify that clicking on the Microsoft logo redirects to the Microsoft login page (TC-342)
LB-1138 : Verify that login fails with invalid credentials and an alert message is displayed (TC-343)
LB-1140 : Verify remember me checkbox is selected during login (TC-345)
LB-1141 : Verify the forgot Password functionality (TC-346)
LB-1142 : Verify clicking on the "Terms of Use" link opens a new page with the terms of use (TC-347)
LB-1143 : Verify clicking on the "Privacy policy" link opens a new page with the privacy policy (TC-348)

failure.message: Testing if element <//h5[contains(text(),'Privacy Policy')]> contains text 'Privacy Policy' in 5000ms - expected "contains text 'Privacy Policy'" but got: "element could not be located" (9703ms)

testcase.name: LB-1139 : Verify successful login with valid credentials (TC-344)
